list.abs: epilogue sums up the course of probing into this question and deficiency of the writing and points out that it is a historical course of developing and perfecting constantly .结语部分概述探讨这一问题的过程和写作之不足，指出探讨这一问题是不断发展、完善的历史过程。
the epilogue told what eventually happened to the main characters .“结语说了最后主角怎么样了”。
the epilogue , however is well known and is formed by the World Cup - Champions League double .然而,事情的结局大家都知道,是世界杯和冠军联赛双丰收.

the 5th chapter is the epilogue part . through summing up the whole paper , we explain the insufficiency existing , and make a prospect of the future development .第五章是论文的结语部分，通过对全文进行总结，阐述文章尚存在哪些不足之处，并对未来的发展方向进行展望。
...堆栈帧中的最后一个条目是一个指向前一堆栈帧的指针，通常被称为后向指针（back pointer）。函数在函数开始过程中（称为函数序言（function prologue））创建堆栈帧，并在函数结束时（称为函数尾声（function epilogue））销毁它。函数的序言通常遵循以下顺序：

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French épilogue, via Latin from Greek epilogos, from epi 'in addition' + logos 'speech'

entry.tran: （书的）后记，尾声，跋;（戏剧的）收场白
entry.def: An epilogue is a passage or speech which is added to the end of a book or play as a conclusion.

means.word_mean: 1. a short speech (often in verse) addressed directly to the audience by an actor at the end of a play
2. a short passage added at the end of a literary work;

sentences.sentence: "the epilogue told what eventually happened to the main characters"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表示"在……上,在……周围,在……后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……周围+dem人民+ic……的→在人民周围→流行的
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+derm皮+al……的→在皮上面→表皮的
epidemiology[n.流行病学]+ist专家或人→epidemiologist[研究]传染病的学者
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+gram写→写在上面的话→格言
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+graph写,刻→刻上的话→碑文
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+logu说+e→在后面说的话→后记
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+s+od路+e→在路上→一段经历;片段
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+taph墓→墓上的[字]→墓志铭

stems_affixes.value_cn: [贬低人的]短语或形容词,绰号
stems_affixes.word_buile: epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+thet放→放在名字上的另一个名字→侮辱性的称呼
epi在……上,在……周围,在……后面+tome卷册→[一卷书后的]梗概
